Package de.unihalle.sqlequalizer

Class Summary
Column saves information about a column type is either Number, Varchar, DateTime or Other refrences_to is setting a foreign key if type == 0 (NUMBER) then digitsAfterColon is used
Connector class creates and maintaines the main database connection to the internal database.
externalDB Class manages the execution of an sql query on an external database.
Haupt  
Login Class handles login for sql-equalizer.
MetaQueryInfo Class collects and maintains meta information about onee single query, hold in attribute currentQuery
OperatorComparer Class for Comparing to Expressions that implemented ZExp.
QueryHandler Class handles exaclty one SQL-Query by parsing him with ZQL-Engine.
QueryUtils Class is a useful collection of static functions helping to handle queries
Table Stores Information of a certain Table by storing the including columns
Task Storing all information about a task
